Chthonic creatures are native denizens of the Elemental Planes of Earth. They produce acid, which they use to help them burrow quickly through the dense rock of their homes. This template can be applied only to a non-outsider that has none of the following subtypes: air, cold, earth, fire, or water. A chthonic creatureâ€™s CR increases by 1 only if the base creature has 5 or more HD.
